translated: Pierre Beaumarchais is a philosopher, a French writer and playwright, born January 24, 1732 in Paris and died May 18, 1799 in the same city.
original: Pierre-Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais est un philosophe, écrivain et dramaturge français, né le 24 janvier 1732 à Paris et mort le 18 mai 1799 dans la même ville.
